mean_en: a state of human society that is very developed and organized; a society, its culture and its way of life during a particular period of time or in a particular part of the world; all the people in the world and the societies they live in, considered as a whole
sentence: They are all outstanding achievements of human civilization.
sentence_trans: 它们都是人类文明中的伟大成就。
word_etyma: civil市民；礼貌 + ization……化 → 文明，文化
